songs.title: We Ain’t Closing Down
songs.lyrics:
We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

It’s 24 hours
Come and shout right now

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
Until that bag gone

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

It’s 24 hours
Come and shout right now

Hey you can get a break
Not matter it’s 3:00 am
It’s 24 hour
Grind you on again
Old Guiseppie’s on my
Fever and I double up
I’m gonna get that money
I just wanna ball
I never had a deal it
Like a superstar
Got a ball and tricks
Come and break it off

Stupid cush bugging
Cali all gone
I drive it across state lines
Breaking off
Get it to the destination
I see money y’all
My shop stay open
Summer, spring, fall
And when I try and stack
Your money talk
Put your fares up
If you wanna ball

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

It’s 24 hours
Come and shout right now

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down
Until that bag gone

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down

It’s 24 hours
Come and shout right now

24-7 it’s about the money
Never closing shop
Just come and get it from me
Keep the trees and petty
I’ll keep it for my people
Put it on the scale
I would not deceive you
Ya wanna have a key
Or a whole key
You may want a pound
Of the OG

Ask around the hood
Yeah they know me
People bargaining
It’s so sweet
Sell a few tons
In a whole week
I been on the scene
Made OD
Short with the money
So he owe me
Aiin’t paying
What he owe
So I take it back
Mace the pack
Like I laced the rat
Niggas
Wanna be the king
But the ace is back
I’m the realest
And that nigga
Gotta face the facts

Nigga like a pin
How I place the trap
Repping  the trap
Like I’m making crack
Sleep on me
You gonna take a nap
Waste a mac
Get your face detached
You gonna fade to black

We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down
It’s 24 hours
Come and shout right now
We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down
Until that bag gone
We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down
We ain’t closing down
It’s 24 hours
Come and shout right now

We ain’t closing down
BG Knocc Out in the house
Claybo in the house
And (inaudible) in
And we all in
